definition: no matter what or how/regardless of whether...
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means

sentences.english: anywhere you want to go,  there's always somebody friendly.
sentences.chinese: 無論你想去哪兒，都會有些友好的人。

sentences.english: Whether it is animals or ancient figures will let you clap wow .
sentences.chinese: 無論是動物還是古代人物都會讓你拍手叫絕。

sentences.english: The question is whether the dedicated have had more influence than the image- flashers .
sentences.chinese: 問題是無論如何對閱讀的這種關注比圖片根由影響。

sentences.english: Devotional service must continue under all circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 無論在任何情況下都不應停止奉愛服務。

sentences.english: Still, the results are encouraging, opening a new pathway of study.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，結果還是喜人的，並打開一條研究的新路。

sentences.english: In any event, protecting yourself against such a case is relatively easy.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，防止自己攤上這種官司相對比較容易。

sentences.english: We must persist in study on for good or for evil.
sentences.chinese: 無論好壞，我們都要堅持學完。

sentences.english: Regardless of the difficulties encountered in life, has the world's way out.
sentences.chinese: 無論人生遇到什麼困難，世界總有路可走。

sentences.english: Whatever we do now is too late.
sentences.chinese: 無論我們現在做什麼都太晚了。

sentences.english: Just prepare another round, whenever your fever acts up again.
sentences.chinese: 無論何時你又發燒了，只要再準備一份薑茶。

sentences.english: This law also applies if the bull gores a son or daughter.
sentences.chinese: 牛無論觸了人的兒子或是女兒，必照這例辦理。

sentences.english: Whatever the problem, it is not confined to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 無論是什麼問題，都不僅限於在日本發生。

sentences.english: This would be a valid passing opportunity regardless of whether there was pre-existing overlap.
sentences.chinese: 這時後車有權超越，無論有無預先存在“重疊”。

sentences.english: It's by no means causative of the skyline of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何也不可能決定巴黎的建築。

sentences.english: No, I could never agree to sign this contract.
sentences.chinese: 不，我無論如何也不會籤這份合同。

sentences.english: They’ll accomplish something great, no matter what.
sentences.chinese: 他們將完成重要的事情，無論什麼事情。

definition: whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
